title: aging_water_pump_and_hose_connection_issue
summary: Aging water pump equipment with rusted hose clamp causing intermittent water flow disruption.
description: Documentation of water pump infrastructure at MaMeeFarm showing rusted and deteriorated hose clamp and tools in use. The aging condition causes the hose to loosen during operation, resulting in intermittent pumping interruptions. This record reflects ongoing work under equipment and resource constraints.

external_reference.note: External reference is provided for verification convenience only and does not serve as a primary anchor.
